misc.post: How did this turn into a religious discussion, I thought it was about comets. Anyway it turns out this comet is not a dirty snowball more like a lump of rock. Https://problemswiththebigbang.wordpress.com/2015/06/18/comets are they really snowballs the evidence says no/.
